template.name: Basic stylesheet - XSLT 1.0
template.description: Matches the root of the input

templates.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="${xsl_version}" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="/"> <!-- TODO: Auto-generated template -->${cursor} </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

template.name: Basic stylesheet - XSLT 2.0
template.description: XSLT 2.0 - Matches the root of the input

templates.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="2.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="/"> <!-- TODO: Auto-generated template -->${cursor} </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

template.name: Copy stylesheet - XSLT 1.0
template.description: Makes a copy of the input

templates.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="${xsl_version}" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="${cursor}"> <!-- TODO: Auto-generated template --> </xsl:template> <!-- standard copy template --> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

template.name: Copy stylesheet - XSLT 2.0
template.description: Makes a copy of the input

templates.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="2.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="${cursor}"> <!-- TODO: Auto-generated template --> </xsl:template> <!-- standard copy template --> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
